description: Have you ever wanted to learn the Brazilian Portuguese Language but you are not sure where to start? If so you have come to the right place. In the Introduction to Brazilian Portuguese you will get an overview of the language and by the end of the course you will be able to say simple phrases like greetings, asking how you are doing, etc. I have spent two years in Brazil and I can actually have a pleasant conversation. And I know that you can too. So what are you waiting for lets sign up for the Introduction to Brazilian Portuguese and get you speaking it like a Native.
title: Introduction to Brazilian Portuguese
